channel.title: Ftp stopped working
channel.description:
FTP connection using Filezilla in Whonix workstation stopped working for me. About 1month ago it worked. Dont you know why please? It connects to server, but finishes at these errors:
Status: Connecting to 127.0.0.1:9150... Status: Connection with proxy established, performing handshake... Error: Connection timed out Error: Failed to retrieve directory listing
sometimes it gives me also Error: Disconnected from server: ECONNABORTED - Connection aborted.
my filezilla settings: SOCKS 5,Host 127.0.0.1 Port "9150". 'FTP proxy' none. Also tried 9050 port.
I found some info, that it could be tor problem, but havent found solution.

item.title: Ftp stopped working
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Maybe the 127.0.0.1 -> Whonix-Gateway redirection is broken for you?

Try applying https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Stream_Isolation. Point at Whonix-Gateway’s IP + custom port for stream isolation.

Read full topic

item.title: Ftp stopped working
item.dc:creator: jimmy89
item.description:
FTP connection using Filezilla in Whonix workstation stopped working for me. About 1month ago it worked. Dont you know why please? It connects to server, but finishes at these errors:

Status: Connecting to 127.0.0.1:9150…
Status: Connection with proxy established, performing handshake…
Error: Connection timed out
Error: Failed to retrieve directory listing

sometimes it gives me also
Error: Disconnected from server: ECONNABORTED - Connection aborted.

my filezilla settings: SOCKS 5,Host 127.0.0.1 Port “9150”. ‘FTP proxy’ none. Also tried 9050 port.

I found some info, that it could be tor problem, but havent found solution.
